name: DigitalDisruptionDaily
0:
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: The experience era is upon us. Get news, insights, and opinions on the latest disruptions in CX, digital experience (DX), and the business of experience (BX) to expand your mindset about leadership in this new economy.
